TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlDirective extends System.Xaml.XamlMember

summary.span: 在成员兼作 XAML 指令时为成员提供 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: Provides the XAML type system identifier for a member if the member is also a XAML directive.

summary.span: 在处理成员节点的过程中，XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器使用 标识符。

span.span: XAML readers and XAML writers use the identifier during processing of member nodes.

summary.span: 如果读取器位于 上，而且 为 ，则使用此标识符。

span.span: The identifier is used when the XAML reader is positioned on a and is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该成员是 XAML 指令时提供的 XAML 类型系统的预期值。 provides expected values for the XAML type system when the member is a XAML directive. 根据定义，XAML 指令具有始终返回相同的结果的子集的特征属性，并与相同的 XAML 类型系统信息报告的所有可能的 XAML 指令。By definition, a XAML directive has characteristics that always return the same results for a subset of the properties, and the same XAML type system information is reported for all possible XAML directives. 特定于指令的 XAML 类型系统特征的报告由内部行为或通过重写之一来完成`Lookup*`中的虚拟成员类。The reporting of XAML type system characteristics that are specific to directives is accomplished by internal behavior or through overrides of `Lookup*` virtual members in the class. 以下列表显示了返回的结果为是 XAML 指令成员实际上是:The following list shows the returned results of a XAML directive for when the member is actually a : - 始终`null`。 is always `null`. - 始终`null`。 is always `null`. - 始终`null`。 is always `null`. - 始终`false`。 is always `false`. - 始终`false`。 is always `false`. - 始终`true`。 is always `true`. - 始终`false`。 is always `false`. - 始终`false`。 is always `false`. - 始终`true`。 is always `true`. - 始终`true`。 is always `true`. 此外，对于内部后备被设置，并返回`null`。Also, the internal backing for remains unset and returns `null`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 是子类。 is a subclass. 如同，具有 XAML 类型系统报告访问权限的方式的安全注意事项。As with , has security considerations regarding how the XAML type system reports access. 请参阅 。See .

related.span: 了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念

span.span: Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，同时为名称和单个 XAML 命名空间指定值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying values for a name and a single XAML namespace.

summary.span: 只有在您希望或预计 对于指令报告 时，才使用此签名。

span.span: Use this signature only when you want or expect to report for the directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此构造函数的签名始终生成指令的标识符其中报表`true`的 XAML 类型系统。This signature of the constructor always generates an identifier for the directive where reports `true` for the XAML type system. 如果所需的信息可用 （后备类型和转换的文本语法的信息项），并且希望可以应用指令，请使用标识符构造函数签名改为。If the necessary information is available (the backing type and a text syntax information item for conversion) and you want an identifier that can apply the directive, use the constructor signature instead. 如果使用此签名值为实例; 并值和值都是`null`。If you use this signature, the value for the instance is ; and the value and value are both `null`.

Public Overrides Function GetXamlNamespaces () As IList(Of String)

summary.span: 返回 XAML 命名空间的列表，此 XAML 成员可能存在于这些命名空间中。

span.span: Returns a list of XAML namespaces where this XAML member can exist.

returns.span: 字符串形式的 XAML 命名空间标识符的列表。

span.span: A list of XAML namespace identifiers, as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 命名空间标识符是通常显示在根据 XAML 和 XML 命名空间的常见约定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 字符串形式的字符串。The XAML namespace identifiers are strings that typically appear in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) string form according to the usual conventions for XAML and XML namespaces. 如果列表包含多个项，在集中的第一项通常是用于处理目的相关的主 XAML 命名空间和其他项是备用项。If the list contains more than one item, the first item in the set is usually the relevant primary XAML namespace for processing purposes, and the other items are alternates. 依赖于此排序。 relies on this ordering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为 XAML 指令不能具有自定义特性，此实现始终返回`null`。Because a XAML directive cannot have custom attributes, this implementation always returns `null`. 密封此虚拟成员;因此，所有类型和所有预定义的 XAML 指令必须使用此行为。 seals this virtual member; therefore, all types and all predefined XAML directives must use this behavior.
